name: Daily Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion (S&P-100 Proxy)
description: Mean-reversion equity strategy trading daily bars of large-cap U.S. stocks using Bollinger Bands (20,2) and RSI-14. Long when price is below the lower band and RSI<30, short when price is above the upper band and RSI>70. Positions exit on touch of the 20-day SMA, 3.5 % gain, or 2.5 % loss. Fixed-fractional sizing risks 2 % equity per trade.
